function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Virus transmission in crowded and poorly ventilated rooms","Impact":"Increased risk of virus spread and infection","Mitigation":"Improving ventilation systems and reducing occupancy in crowded rooms","Technologies":"Air purifiers, HVAC systems, and occupancy monitoring systems","People":"Building occupants, visitors, and employees","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers"},{"Description":"Inadequate building design for preventing virus spread","Impact":"Higher likelihood of virus transmission and infection","Mitigation":"Implementing architectural and interior design changes to improve building capacity to prevent virus spread","Technologies":"Advanced building materials, touchless fixtures, and antimicrobial surfaces","People":"Architects, engineers, and building designers","Owner":"Construction companies, architectural firms"}]}
